title: Terminology Server Challenge at GMDS 2023
description:
This repository contains the postman collection for the held at the 68th Annual Conference of the German Association for Medical Informatics, Biometry and Epidemiology (GMDS) in Heilbronn, Germany, in September 2023.
The Terminology Server Challenge was organized by the Working Group Medical Terminologies and Classifications of the GMDS. For more information see https://web.archive.org/web/https://mii-termserv.de/blogs/2023-07-17-gmds-terminology-server-challenge/
